string.text: They promised twenty thousand for that job. Got back and they gave me six and a pat on the back. Screw every one of those lying parasites.
Should've known. If the pay sounds fair, it's a trap. If it sounds good, it's a con.
You let them get away with that? You're part of the problem.
They feed you shit and you ask for seconds. Don't expect pity from me.
Sidorovich is ripping us off again. His prices are getting ridiculous!
What else is new? That fat fucker's been fleecing stalkers since day one.
Try the black market runners. They move quiet, and sometimes cheap.
Supply and demand, mate. Few brave souls bring goods here.
At least he's alive and selling. Beats getting shot for scrap.
Got a fat stack of ammo but need medkits—anybody keen to swap?
Ammo for medkits? Hell yes, but don't short me or I'll unload on you.
I'm low on bandages, but I got morphine shots. Fair trade?
Supplies are tight—throw in some 5.45s to sweeten the pot.
Interesting proposal. I'll accept, on one condition—return the favor when I need eyes on patrols.
Heard there's a buyer for intel on patrol routes—any maps to sell?
Maps? I might have one. Trade me a scoped rifle and extra mags.
Chat with Sidorovich's rat by the bar. He deals in whispers, not toys.
Maps go stale after emissions. Better scout yourself.
Not a cartographer, but medkit for a sketch of the eastern flank? Done.
Saw a fence peddling electric grenades. Worth the gamble?
Electric grenades? Suicide by shock. Stick to frags.
Used them once—they stun bio-creatures dead cold. Temperamental though.
They short-circuit in damp. Best leave them be.
Fuck yeah, grab some. Nothing says surprise like lightning in a dark burrow.
Need .45 ACP ammo. Will trade two fresh antirads.
Deal. Meet at the dead truck north of Rostok—come alone.
Antirads for bullets? You'll regret that when your skin peels.
Who buys mutant trophies? Got fresh chimera claws.
Sakharov's been paying for samples. Try him.
Duty's building a 'wall of horrors' at the Barrier.
My detector's non-stop beeping—either I hit the jackpot or I'm about to fry.
Both. In this dump you either die rich or broke.
Give it a kick—sometimes fixes more than detectors.
Could be craving attention, like the rest of us.
Silence means shit's incoming—enjoy the racket.
Robbed a bandit earlier—made him walk shoeless. Zone's best entertainment.
Should've shot off a toe, teach him begging's pointless.
Nice. Maybe next time he won't point a rusty Makarov.
Hope he lands on glass. Barefoot justice.
That's mercy here. Better to leave him breathing than soil him.
Spilled my vodka in the mud—great start to any day.
Congrats, you just watered the Zone's only crop.
Drink muddy vodka—it builds character.
Well, at least the mud's sterile.
Better than losing bullets, I guess.
My boots just fell apart mid-loot run—this fuckin' Zone.
Get duct tape—or you'll slip on your own blood.
Boots last longer if you don't stomp corpses in them.
Pro tip: wear dead stalker's boots, never your own stash.
Congrats—shoeless and clueless. Welcome to the Zone.
Ate mystery meat—now my guts feel like they're doing backflips.
Mystery meat's secret poison—enjoy the trip.
Next time cook it twice or make mutant stew.
Vodka cures all—unless it kills you first.
At least you're not starving now.
Anyone know how to fix a busted gas mask filter? Duct tape ain't cutting it.
If duct tape fails, you aren't using enough tape.
Hit the mechanics—junk parts become miracles in their hands.
Just scavenge a new one. Your lungs will thank you.
Coffee filters work in a pinch—just don't breathe deep.
Battery on my NVG died—any hacks to juice it up?
Swap fresh AAs or rip cells from dead geiger counters.
Charge it on a generator—if you can find one without frying.
Rig solar charging with scrap—worth a shot.
Or ditch NVGs and learn to see in the dark.
My AK's barrel is clogged—any quick clean tricks?
Use your shirt and petrol—better than nothing.
Wire brush and bore solvent from the chem dealer work wonders.
Barrel's shot—steel wool and elbow grease, no shortcuts.
Screw cleaning—swap barrels and pray.
Scope's loose—how do I torque the mount?
Grab a wrench—tighten until the rattling stops.
Stuck? Tap gently with a rubber mallet—mind the lens.
Thread locker on screws keeps them in place.
Or duct tape it—fixes everything.
PDA's PSU fried—maps are useless. Any repair hacks?
Swap a fuse if you can scrounge one.
Bridge burnt traces with wire—requires steady hands.
Trade it for a working unit or go blind.
Follow landmarks and sun—PDA's luxury.
You guys hear what happened to Yuris squad in the Red Forest?
They were found standing in a perfect circle, like statues. Zone's mercy doesn't exist.
Controller's handiwork. Poor bastards probably turned on themselves.
Red Forest spares no one. Should've stayed away.
Whatever happened to that rookie who swore he'd hit the Wish Granter in a week?
Found his PDA at the first checkpoint. Guess he ran out of luck.
Zone humbles the arrogant real quick.
Another dreamer turned mutant food. Story as old as time.
Anyone notice the birds acting weird? All flying south.
Animals sense the shifts. Best pack up and move.
Last time this happened, emissions lasted days.
Birds warn more than any detector.
Detector's gone nuts near the old factory. Anyone brave enough to check?
Probably scrap metal. Not worth the radiation.
Could be an artifact. I'll split it 60-40 if you guide me.
Last guy came back speaking in curses. Hard pass.
Fleshes raided our stash last night. Took half our gear before we drove them off.
They're getting bold. Watch your back.
At least you got a stew out of them.
I lost friends to those things. Stay sharp.
Found premium vodka in a bunker. Tastes like salvation after weeks of brake fluid.
Lucky bastard. All I got was moldy MREs.
Share a sip for ammo? I'm running dry.
Zone poisons the good stuff too. Take a whiff first.
Think I'm being followed. Same shadow for three days.
Trust your gut. Better safe than dead.
Could be a phantom. They love lone stalkers.
Zone plays tricks on the mind. Keep moving.
Remember that old timer Vasily? Found him dead today.
Vasily was untouchable. Guess not.
Zone claims everyone eventually. Even legends.
He knew this place best. Shame.
Suit's spitting radiation warnings but detector's calm. Gear glitch?
Electronics fry near psi fields. Look for Controllers.
Prob fried circuits. Zone eats tech for breakfast.
Trust Geiger over suit. Suits lie.
Emission's starting and I'm in the open. Any shelters near Cement Factory?
Underground tunnels east side. Watch for snorks.
Too late now. If you see this later, you made it.
Concrete pipe 200m north. Cramped but breathable.
Tracked an artifact for days—turned out to be a broken headlamp. FML.
Zone loves jokes on us. Happens.
At least you didn't die chasing it like Dmitri.
Three days wasted, but you're alive. Bless up.
Anyone know what happened to Scar's group? They missed a check-in.
Radio's dead. Could be interference.
Scar doesn't die easy. Give it time.
Two hours here equals two years. Start worrying.
This rookie's asking about safe paths through anomalies. Tell him?
Kid learns quick. Better from you than from bolts.
No safe paths, just less deadly ones. And of course bolts!
Tell him to pray and move slow. Works for us.
We need to increase patrols near the Barrier. Too many mutants getting through.
Agreed. Last night we lost two veterans to those bloodsuckers.
If we don't seal it off, civilians will pay the price.
I'll organize the squads.
Intel reports a Freedom cell scouting our routes. They might strike next week.
We'll reroute convoys through clearing Echo. Less cover for ambushes.
Send in recon drones at 0400 hours. They won't expect aerial watches.
Inform command—prepare rapid-response team on standby.
Supply lines to Rostok are delayed—weather's closing in, risk of capsule jam.
Secure the drop point with sandbags. Keep radios hot for extraction.
I'll dispatch the engineer team—they'll clear ice and reset the launcher.
Rotate patrols tighter. No room for error in these conditions.
New artifacts detected near the old power plant. Could be volatile.
Artifact specialists en route. Keep civilians away from perimeter.
Deploy security nets around anomalous zone. No unauthorized entry.
Coordinate with Clear Sky for safe retrieval protocols.
Casualties just came in. One wounded soldier, heavy radiation exposure.
Evac ASAP to medical bunker. Prep decontamination chamber.
Log the incident. We need to adjust patrol patterns near anomaly sites.
Make sure that paperwork is well filled.
High-value target spotted near the train yard. Freedom operative.
Set up a roadblock at sector Tango. No one in or out.
Sharpshooters on rooftops. Only take a shot if confirmed.
Keep intel flowing. We need eyes on every exit route.
Incoming transmission: civilian convoy reported missing near Sector 12.
Dispatch search party with armored support. No one left behind.
Coordinate with medical unit. Prepare field triage.
Watch for bandit traps. Use drones first.
Comm logs show a psyonic flare detected near Control Point Alpha.
Evacuate all units immediately. Psy-ops are unpredictable.
Activate psi-shield arrays. Safety first.
Log coordinates. We'll analyze for anomaly patterns.
Resupply vehicles were attacked at dawn—lost half the ammo stock.
Requisition emergency stock from Depot 3.
Increase escort detail. No transport moves solo.
File incident report. Identify weaknesses.
Satellite feed shows unauthorized aircraft near the Zone perimeter.
Scramble AA units. Do not engage until clearance.
Track visual ID. Could be rogue contractors.
Alert HQ. Prepare diplomatic channels.
High psionic readings near anomaly cluster Theta-9.
Deploy psi-shield gear to all patrols.
Notify researchers—prepare containment gadgets.
Establish no-go perimeter.
Field reports: heavy sniping near the old bridge entrance.
Deploy counter-sniper team. Zero tolerance for threats.
Seal off approach routes. Force retreat.
Use thermal scopes. Darkness won't hide them.
Medical reports: radiation sickness cases doubling near Eastmine.
Administer antirad kits and rotate crews faster.
Seal off contaminated sectors. No exceptions.
Log data and forward to scientists for decontamination research.
Supply drone A7 went rogue. Last ping over Sector 5.
Initiate fail-safe. Destroy drone if recovery fails.
Track signal. Could be intercepted by Clear Sky.
Recover data logs—no intel leak allowed.
HQ requests list of all active patrols within 10km radius.
Compiling now—will dispatch to command shortly.
Recommend adding two more squads west of checkpoint Bravo.
Ensure vehicles are fueled. No delays.
Incoming evac request: civilian scientist injured near lab 13.
Dispatch medevac chopper—clear LZ.
Provide air cover. Zone anomalies around area.
Prepare debrief. We need intel from that scientist.
Satellite imagery: new underground structure detected beneath Sector 8.
Recon team at dawn. Bring crawling gear.
Mark on map. Could be enemy bunker.
Coordinate with Demolition unit for tunnel stability.
Internal Financial audit: spending Duty resources on personal gear upgrades is over-budget this quarter.
Submit justification, lives saved equals cost worth.
Again out of our own pocket? Cyka.
Damn, there goes my savings.
Reports of traitors passing intel to Freedom. Investigation underway.
Lock down internal comms. No leaks tolerated.
Interrogate suspected contacts. Zero mercy.
Rotate passwords and secure channels.
High psionic readings near anomaly cluster Theta-9.
Deploy psi-shield gear to all patrols.
Notify researchers—prepare containment gadgets.
Establish no-go perimeter.
The military's pushing too hard. They'll turn the Zone into a fortress soon.
Let them try. We'll show them who really owns these ruins.
More checkpoints only mean more bribes. We can slip through.
I've got eyes on their patrol routes. We'll stay one step ahead.
Alert all teams! Massive psi-emissions in Jupiter's eastern warehouse complex. Feels like a goddamn kindergarten for Controllers.
Confirmed. My detector's screaming—but interference patterns suggest artifacts. Something new buried in that mess.
Duty patrols are setting perimeter blocks 500m out. “For our safety.” Bullshit—they want first dibs!
Typical Duty dogs. Since when do they care about safety? Remember what they did at the Burner anomaly?
Fuck their barricades. I've got jury-rigged psi-blockers. Who's crazy enough to run the field with me?
Heads up: Bandits ambushed our medic run near the swamp bridge. Lost antibiotics and blood kits.
Those parasitic fucks! Kostya's leg wound's festering—he needs those meds NOW.
Check the Freedom cache behind Yanov. Should be emergency stocks.
Already raided. Only empty syringes left. Fucking looters didn't even reseal the container.
I've got two vials of antibiotics. Take them. No payment needed—that's not how we operate.
Just found a Fireball artifact fused to a dead rookie's hand near the Circus. Harvest it?
Christ. Another one who thought artifacts were toys. Leave it—that's a grave marker now.
But energy readings are off the charts! We could learn why it bonded permanently.
Learn by desecration? We're not Duty. Tag the body for Ecologists if you're curious.
Compromise: photograph the fusion pattern, bolt-burn the site. Knowledge without theft.
Swamp team report: Snorks are hunting in PACKS now. Saw three coordinate an ambush by the church.
Impossible. Snorks are solitary. Sure it wasn't just a feeding frenzy?
Positive. One flushed me toward two others hiding underwater—tactical behavior.
Zone's accelerating mutations. Last week blind dogs started climbing trees in Red Forest.
Fuck that. Upload raw vid to our public server. Every stalker deserves the truth.
Duty armored column moving toward Yanov checkpoint—six exos, two RPGs.
Over artifacts? Let them come. We've got psy-block and height advantage.
Stand down—they think we ambushed their patrol near the train yard.
Bullshit. We were mapping anomalies all night. Tell them to check Monolith logs.
Voronin's transmitting: “Return our men or we burn your outpost.”
Freedom Radio test broadcast in 10! Who's got today's main segment?
Me—exposing how Duty's artifact seizures end up in black markets.
Save that for Wednesday. Today: bypass Army checkpoints via sewage tunnels.
Add warning—bloodsuckers in Pipe sector drained two loners yesterday.
End with Strelok's quote: “The Zone belongs to those who walk it, not cage it.”
Confirmed: Mercs stole our prototype emitter from Jupiter lab. Tracking them toward Dead City.
That emitter disrupts Brain Scorcher fields! They'll sell it to the highest bidder.
Assemble intercept team. Priority: recover tech intact. Secondary: leave no witnesses.
Since they murdered three scientists, this isn't theft—it's war.
EMERGENCY: Electro-storm forming over Sector 13 from ground zero.
Fuck. That's where we stored the artifact resonance array. Did someone activate it?
Worse: Duty tried dismantling it. Now it's overloading.
Those fucking idiots! Assemble a squad ASAP.
Last food shipment destroyed by pseudogiants. Three days of rations left.
Open the communal kitchen to ALL stalkers. No Freedom ID checks.
That'll empty stocks in hours! We need to prioritize our own.
Bullshit hierarchy talk! Share or become Duty. I'll donate my stash.
Intel reports a mole in our ranks feeding information to Duty. We need eyes on everyone at HQ.
Everyone's a suspect now? We'll turn our base into a hall of mirrors. Perfect cover for real spies.
Let's set a trap, leak false coordinates or something.
Paranoia won't help. We need proof, shadow suspects until they slip, then handle it quietly.
Scouts report that the new Duty blockade north of Rostok is stronger than intel suggested. They've got heavy MG nests.
We'll need a diversion, set off a false anomaly alarm at the old mill to draw them away.
Or sneak through the drainage tunnels beneath the tracks. Minimal guard presence at night.
There has to be a better way.
Maintenance crew at the power plant uncovered a hidden archive—maps of old military caches.
Finally some real treasure. Send a small team with light packs—speed over firepower.
Hold up—those maps could be bait. Duty's known to plant false leads.
Cross-reference with Ecologist surveys. If anomalies overlap, it's legit.
Local loners captured a strayed Bloodsucker and chained it in the church cellar. Should we use it as bait?
Inhumane. We need that data intact. Observe from a distance, then release it back.
Bait's ideal, but a live Bloodsucker's unpredictable. We'll lose men before we learn anything.
Compromise: sedate it, then record behavior under controlled psi-field. No casualties.
Strange rainfall turning acidic near Yantar. Several stalkers report burns on exposed skin.
Collect samples immediately. If we can neutralize the rain, we secure safe passage.
Advise everyone to stay under cover. This isn't worth risking lives for curiosity.
Patch together old filter masks from the lab. Distribute them before the next shower.
A new faction's banner spotted near Agroprom. They claim to be artifact salvagers for hire.
Hire them against Duty. Two wolves fight, the third takes the spoils.
They'll turn on us when the price drops. Better keep them at arm's length.
Scout their base. If they're desperate, we can outbid them for the big finds.
Chimera tracks found west of Limansk. Two creatures moving in tandem—unprecedented.
That's bad news. Avoid the area and reroute the supply convoy through the canal road.
Or lure them into the lightning field near the radar station. Might thin their ranks.
Tag the spot with flare rounds. Let Duty's hunters deal with mutated nightmares.
Voice on the open channel claiming to be “Strelok.” They say a massive event is coming at 0400.
If it's really him, we prepare. Double watch rotations and energize all psi-shields.
Could be a trap. Broadcast false “all clear” and watch who reacts at 0400.
Contact Ecologists for anomaly readings. If the signal's genuine, we get time to evac.
Warehouse raid last night netted experimental ammo—armor-piercing rounds with psi-tip warheads.
Test them on a sealed container. If they work, we alter our tactics—no more ambushes.
Dangerous tech. Store them away from living quarters until we know effects on humans.
Trade half to loners for intel on Duty patrols. Keep the rest for emergencies.
Final call: Freedom's quarterly supply drop hits the Chernaya depot at dawn. Volunteers?
I'm in. Send me the coords and rally point. I'll clear the route.
We need more medics on that run. Three got wounded last time.
Better send a stealth team. No need to announce we're restocking.
Recon reported psionic activity in Sector D today. Keep your distance.
Copy that. Moving to position Bravo for overwatch.
Sir, those anomalies could wipe out an entire squad.
We'll set up motion sensors and stay out of range.
Army convoy en route with winter gear—ETA 1430. Verify delivery protocol upon arrival.
Funds reserved. Supply officer standing by at drop zone.
Requesting ETA update in 30 minutes to synchronize unloading teams.
Understood. We'll inspect manifest thoroughly before releasing goods.
Confirm convoy security detail and convoy route clearance.
Recon patrol spotted unauthorized militia activity near Dark Valley supply routes.
Recommend dispatching recon team to monitor and report faction strength.
Shall we set up an observation post on the ridge for constant surveillance?
Increase patrol frequency on the main artery to deter incursions.
Contractors repaired radar array but reported excessive wear on panels.
Order replacement panels through logistics; expected delivery in 72 hours.
Request detailed maintenance report before approving further work.
Authorize limited operations until parts arrive; extend shifts to compensate.
Intel indicates unauthorized raid planned at warehouse—prepare perimeter defense.
Authorize preemptive deployment to secure warehouse.
Set up surveillance drones overnight to confirm threat.
Coordinate response teams for rapid interception.
Fuel convoy stalled at choke point—route assessment needed.
Dispatch engineers to clear obstructions and reopen the route.
Authorize temporary reroute through secondary road; update convoy ASAP.
Hold position and set up defensive perimeter until route is confirmed clear.
Field medics request additional blood units for triage station tomorrow.
Allocate 100 units from reserve and schedule replenishment run.
Offer half now; remaining contingent on usage reports by end of day.
Deny additional units; advise using plasma expanders until stocks arrive.
Payroll files show duplicate entries—finance needs clarification before disbursement.
Task admin team to audit entries; hold payment until resolved.
Approve base salary; hold bonuses pending review.
Contact unit commanders for justification of duplicate claims.
Network breach detected overnight. Backdoor signatures match previous intrusion.
Isolate affected nodes and patch vulnerabilities immediately.
Feed false logs to honeypot systems and trace the attacker.
Request cyber unit support for counter-intrusion measures.
Navigation drill scheduled at 0600 tomorrow. Focus on night ops and comms silence.
All squads briefed; compasses and NVGs issued.
Recommend adding urban terrain module at Sector V.
Confirm casualty extraction point and medevac coordinates.
Suspicious movement detected near the old Yantar bunker. Possible intel scan.
Dispatch recon to observe and report before engagement.
Increase sensor sweep frequency in that sector.
Coordinate with EOD team in case of anomalous devices.
Ammo crate labels don't match manifest. Suspect misrouting or error.
Hold the crate and audit serial numbers against armory logs.
Open sample crate for manual inspection.
Notify supply HQ of discrepancy and await instructions.
Base radio requests CO interview for morale segment.
Approve pre-recorded message highlighting unit achievements.
Why not a live broadcast.
Decline; risk of operational details leaking.
Cleanup crew cleared runoff but left contaminated soil piles.
Order immediate hauling of soil to secure containment site.
Request environmental impact assessment report.
Schedule soil decontamination with EOD support.
Unauthorized groups reported near checkpoint Echo—tension escalating.
Reinforce checkpoint and verify identities of all travelers.
Deploy non-lethal crowd control measures if needed.
Initiate comms blackout to prevent coordination among unauthorized groups.
Fuel shortage may impact casualty extraction. Alternative plans required.
Reallocate fuel from noncritical vehicles immediately.
Prioritize medevac over routine transport.
Coordinate with logistics HQ for emergency fuel drop-mail.
Sensor team detected new anomaly readings—requires recalibration.
Schedule recalibration session at Sector V tomorrow morning.
Send tech team to site with calibration kits.
Cross-check data with central lab before field deployment.
Checkpoint logs flagged false IDs used by personnel. Investigation needed.
Detain holders and verify identity at HQ.
Upgrade ID scanning protocols with biometric backup.
Audit checkpoint logs for further anomalies.
Convoy departs sector Gamma at 0900—escort details pending.
Assign two infantry squads for close escort.
Provide UAV overwatch for the entire route.
Confirm ammunition resupply point mid-route.
We've calibrated the detector, there's a hidden lab under the old refinery.
If it's underground, artifacts'll be off the charts.
I'll mark it on the map. We go in at dawn.
Watch for security measures. this place was military grade.
Psi-readings spiking near the weeping anomaly. Possible new artifact cluster.
Deploy mobile dampeners. Last emission scrambled our gear for days.
I'll prep the grav scanner. If it's a Flash, we need containment protocols.
Remember '07? Those psi-clusters ate three detectors. Tread carefully.
Renegade snipers spotted at the drowned church. They're targeting scavengers.
Kravchenko's boys. They'll bleed us dry if we don't push back.
Set up anomaly traps on the north path. Let the Zone deal with them.
Lebedev won't like diverting resources... but we've lost too many already.
Anomaly batteries at 12%. Who used the last charger without logging it?
Check the south bunker. Saw Petrenko hoarding them for “critical research”.
I'll trade artifacts to Sidorovich if we're desperate. His prices are criminal though.
This is why we need that solar array fixed. Relying on generators is suicide.
Pseudogiant carcass in the acid fog. Something tore it apart... not bullets.
Chimera. Track the blood trail before rain washes it away.
Collect tissue samples! Mutagenic properties could be off the scale.
Seal perimeter gates. If that thing's hunting near base, we're sitting ducks.
Blowout predicted in 90 minutes. All teams return to Bolotno immediately.
Stuck near the sulfur springs! Requesting backup extraction.
Seismic readings match '12 patterns. This'll be a category 4 at least.
God, not again. Reinforce the bunker doors this time!
Found a Goldfish cluster in the electric anomaly. Readings show 700% purity.
Don't celebrate yet. Last “pure” artifacts melted through lead containers.
Ecologists will pay a fortune for these. Finally fix the water filters.
Use ceramic tongs and triple shielding. One static shock could fry us all.
Duty patrols crossing into our sector. “Checking for bandits” they say.
Let them. Better than Renegades scouting our defenses.
Bullshit. They're artifact poaching. Set up motion sensors on cache Gamma.
Remember the truce. But if they touch the research tent... drop them.
Radiation sickness outbreak in Barracks 3. Quarantine protocols initiated.
Vodka stocks depleted. Need more antirads ASAP.
Was it the contaminated water again? I warned about the pipes!
Prep the decon showers. And someone check the damn Geiger counters!
Scout team Alpha overdue from the red forest. Last transmission mentioned... distortions.
Not distortions. Controller fields. They're gone.
I'll take a SEVA squad. We owe them a retrieval.
Lebedev forbade forest excursions after the last incident. Damn the orders.
Modified the detector to track psi-ghosts. Testing near the cemetery tonight.
Finally! If this works, we can predict emission sources.
Bring extra batteries. Cemetery anomalies drain power like vampires.
Just don't wake the poltergeists. Last guy who tried still twitches.
Convoy to Yantar ambushed. Lost the medicine shipment.
Bandits or Monolith? Either way, we're screwed without antibiotics.
I'll ask the Ecologists for help. They owe us for the artifact data.
Forget diplomacy. Let's hit their stash at the old factory tonight.
Found a pre-Collapse lab journal. Mentions “Noosphere breaches” in sector G7.
That's where Strelok disappeared... Coincidence?
Scan for residual psi-waves. If C-Consciousness left echoes...
Don't chase ghosts. We barely survived last week's blowout.
Renegades breached the southern wire. Need volunteers for repair detail.
Rig the gap with springboards. They won't expect active anomalies.
I'll cover from the watchtower. Anyone in blue gets a bullet.
Make it fast. Bloodsuckers hunt near the breach at dusk.
Satellite imagery shows an intact X-ray detector in the sunken barge.
That's pre-war tech! We could boost our scanning range by 300%.
Barge's flooded with radioactive water. Need sealed suits.
Watch for snork mutants. They nest in wrecks like that.
Lebedev canceled the antenna project. Says resources go to defense.
He's wrong. Without comms, we're blind during emissions.
Do it quietly. I've got spare parts hidden near the generator.
Remember what happened to Markov when he questioned orders? Drop it.
Acid fog shifting toward base. Evacuate non-essentials to the bunker.
Seal the ventilation shafts! Last time it corroded the reactor housing.
Is this weather or an anomaly? Feels... intentional.
Grab the artifact containers first. Corrosion ruins their containment fields.
New recruit passed out during anomaly drill. Too much vodka last night?
Make him clean the bio-scanners. That'll sober him up.
Or send him to collect jellyfish near the renegade camp. Trial by fire.
We were all green once. Just keep him away from the electro anomalies.
Time dilation field detected near the oak tree. Clocks run 40% slower inside.
Finally! Proof of temporal anomalies. Prep the recording gear!
Do NOT enter. Remember what happened to the Ecologists in Jupiter?
Throw a bolt in. If it ages/decays, we've got a goldmine of data.
Today marks 8 years since the CNPP assault. Light a candle at 2100.
To the fallen. We carry the torch they dropped.
They died for knowledge. We honor them by surviving.
... and by making sure that sacrifice wasn't in vain. *raises canteen*
Duty convoy wrecked near the checkpoint! Guns 'n ammo just sittin' in the mud, suka!
Dibs on the PKM! Anyone touches it gets knifed.
Scavenge fast before Monolith freaks show up. Or worse… Duty reinforcements.
Leave the medkits. Probably poisoned by those clean-suit fucks.
Set up the “anomaly detector” near Garbage. Greenhorns pay 500 rubles for a broken PDA.
HA! Throw in a “blessed artifact” (rocks) for extra cash.
If they complain, shoot 'em. Free gear too.
Just don't scam Sid's customers. He'll skin us alive.
Mercs sniffin' around Dark Valley. Who left the damn gate open again?
Not my shift. Ask Boris. He was vodka-drunk on watch.
Ambush 'em at the tunnel. Steal their fancy NATO toys.
Nah, hide the good loot. They'll leave when they see our “hospitality”.
Bloodsucker in the depot! Ate two guys already. Someone deal with it!
Lock the door. Starve it out. Problem solved.
Throw a rookie in as bait. We shoot while it feeds. Easy.
Just torch the building. Who needs supplies anyway?
Vasily sold our stash to Freedom! Find that traitorous sukablyad!
Leave his body in the swamps. Snorks'll recycle him.
I know his girlfriend's hideout. She'll talk… or pay.
Forget revenge. Steal Freedom's shit back. Double profit!
NO VODKA LEFT. This is a goddamn emergency.
Raid the Duty outpost. They confiscated our last shipment.
Drink antifreeze like '08. Tastes worse but gets you deader faster!
Trade artifacts to Sid. His stash is endless… for the right price.
Loner with a Gauss rifle limpin' through Agroprom. Weak as a kitten.
Gauss rifle? Mine now. Meet you at the construction site.
Could be bait. Snipers on the roof in case it's a trap.
Shoot his legs first. More fun when they crawl.
Ghosts in the factory again. Heard whisperin' near the furnace.
Pour vodka on the floor. Spirits love free drinks.
It's just Snorks in the vents. Again. Ignore 'em.
Bet 500R it's Freedom spies. Let's smoke 'em out!
Boss got eaten by pseudodogs. Who wants his fancy coat?
ME! I'll pay… in promises I won't keep.
Draw straws. Short straw gets the coat… and Duty's bullet list.
Sell the coat to Sid. Split the cash and stay leaderless. Less work.
Rigged the bridge with grenades. Freedom patrols cross here daily.
Add fire bottles. Make it pretty.
Wait for them to carry loot back. Double harvest!
Don't forget to loot fingers for their faction rings. Good trophies.
Caught a Merc scout. He's got a map to their stash. Interrogate?
Cut off toes 'til he talks. One per minute.
Sell him back to his group. Mercs pay well for their own.
Give him to Snorks. Free entertainment.
Found a barrel of glowing vodka in Pripyat! Tastes like victory!
Save me some! I wanna glow in the dark too!
Dilute it with water. Make it last longer.
If we die, bury me with the barrel. Cheeki breeki forever.
Heist at Sid's warehouse went FUBAR. Three dead. Run.
Told you not to touch his stuff! Now we're all dead men.
Blame it on Duty. Sid'll believe it.
Time to hide in the swamps. Clear Sky's too dumb to find us.
Chained a flesh near the rookie camp. Pays to watch 'em scream.
Charge 5 bullets per viewing. Profit!
Better: Bet on how long they survive. I say 20 seconds.
If it breaks loose, YOU'RE feeding it, genius.
5000R bounty on a Clear Sky nerd. Last seen in swamps. Easy money?
Swamps? Pass. Snorks eat better than we do.
Lure him out. Offer “artifacts” (landmines).
Take the job then shoot the bounty giver. DOUBLE bounty!
Oleg owes me 10,000R from dice. He's “forgetting”.
Break his kneecaps. Standard interest rate.
Forget cash. Take his girl. Or his gun.
Rig next game. Win his pants too.
Pushed a rookie into a vortex. He's spinning like a top! HA!
Throw bolts at him. Extra points for headshots!
Record it! We'll sell the footage to Loners.
When he pukes, bet on the color. I say green.
Roof collapsed in barracks. Who stored grenades in the attic?!
Not my problem. I sleep in the stolen APC.
Good! More “ventilation”. Zone's finest architecture.
Blame Freedom. Then steal THEIR base.
Saw a black chimera near camp. Zone's pissed at us… again.
Sacrifice Boris. He's useless anyway.
Nah, it's just hungry. Toss it some Loner leftovers.
If it's black, it's radioactive! Shoot it and sell the meat to Sid!
Found a guitar with one string. Who knows “Black Eyes”?!
I'll bang the wall! DRINKING SONG TIME!
Play it loud! Scare off the blue nerds in the swamps!
If you play off-key, you're chimera bait.
Loner limping through Garbage. Looks like he got chewed up near the depot. Gear's decent. Easy pickings?
Ambush at the crane. I'll take point. You flank, suka.
Could be bait. Seen Duty sniffing around. Watch your six.
Just shoot 'im. Less noise, less attention. Keep the medkits.
Found an empty bunker north of Agroprom. Dry, mostly intact. Staking it.
Like hell you are. Me and Grisha found it first. Bring friends, we shoot.
Check for traps. Last crew that squatted here ended up snork food.
Dibs on the back room. Anyone comes near my stash gets knifed.
Viktor promised half the artifact haul. Saw him sneaking off towards Sidorovich alone.
Told you. Never trust a face that scarred. Meet at Sid's back door?
Let him sell it. Easier to take the rubles off his corpse later.
Or tip off Bandits he's carrying. Watch the show, take the scraps.
Dead Merc near the bridge. Good armor, but Monolith patrol closing in. Worth the risk?
Grab the rifle mags and run. Armor's too hot to move fast.
Loot the grenades. Toss one at the fanatics for a distraction.
Not my problem. Find easier meat.
Military chopper scanning the Swamps. They're hunting deserters. Lay low.
Head for the anomaly cluster. Their sensors glitch near electro fields.
Dump the military-issue ammo. It's evidence.
Find a Loner patrol. Start a firefight, slip away while they're busy.
Found a crate of MREs under the train cars. Mine.
Like hell. Half, or I torch the lot. Nobody eats.
Share one box. Rest you hide. Don't tell anyone else.
Trade some for ammo with the Bandits. They're less likely to shoot traders.
Clear Sky rookie crying near the gas anomaly. Lost his detector. Soft target.
Take his suit. SEVA fetches good rubles, even damaged.
Ransom him? His faction might pay... or just shoot us.
Push him into the gas. See if he melts. Then loot the corpse.
Bandits offering 500R per Clear Sky ear. We huntin' blues?
Easy money. They're weak in the southern swamps.
Take the ears, then ambush the Bandit paymaster. Keep all the cash.
Not worth it. Blues fight like cornered rats when desperate.
The factory basement rad levels are spiking. Gotta move again.
Dump the heavy gear. Faster to run light.
Find that sewer pipe near the dump. Stinks, but low rads.
Screw it. Pop antirads and stay. Better than getting shot outside.
Duty and Freedom scrapping at the checkpoint. Gear scattered everywhere.
Crawl through the ditch. Grab rifles, leave the heavy armor.
Toss a grenade into the middle. More bodies, more loot.
Wait for winners to leave. Pick over the losers. Safer.
Oleg's hoarding the good ammo again. Saw him stash a box of AP rounds.
Take it while he sleeps. He's too slow to catch us.
Tell him Bandits are coming. He'll panic and lead us to all his stashes.
Shoot him. Problem solved, ammo distributed. Fair.
Merc squad setting up overwatch near our camp. They look professional. We bolt?
Abandon camp. Now. They'll shoot first, ask never.
Set traps on the way out. Slow 'em down.
Try talking? Offer to scout for them... then disappear at first chance.
Big emission just hit. Everyone's scrambling. Time to loot the panicked.
Hit the rookie village in Garbage. Easy prey, disoriented.
Find artifact fields. Stalkers drop goodies running for cover.
Too risky. Mutants go crazy after emissions. Find a hole, hide.
Caught Sasha trying to sell our artifact map to Bandits. What's the play?
Break his hands. Send him back to the Bandits as a message.
Sell him *to* the Bandits as a slave. Get paid twice.
Use him as bait in a snare anomaly. Free entertainment.
Found a working truck near Cordon. Keys inside. Can we get it running?
Siphon the fuel first. Worth more than the truck right now.
Too noisy. Military or Bandits will hear it miles away. Scrap it.
Push it into an anomaly. Big boom, good laugh.
Duty's posting bounties on "Swamp Rats" (us). Keep heads down.
Stop raiding near their patrol routes. Hit the north swamps instead.
Find out who took the contract. Make an example of them.
Blame it on the Bandits. Plant some loot near their stash.
New guy "Nikolai" asking too many questions about stashes. Spy?
Probably Freedom or Ecologist. Dump him in a springboard field.
Feed him false info. See who he reports to.
Just shoot him. Less hassle. Trust no one new.
Bandits offering a truce to hit a Merc convoy. Double-cross likely?
Absolutely. Hit the convoy, then hit the Bandits while they loot.
Take the deal. Steal a truck during the fight and bug out with the goods.
Tip off the Mercs. Let them soften up the Bandits first.
Dead pseudodog. Meat's rotten, but collar looks military-grade. Take it?
Might have a tracker. Smash it, sell the electronics scrap.
Wear it. Scare rookies. Or confuse mutants.
Leave it. Smells like trouble. Not worth 5 rubles.
Another year in this shithole. Anyone celebrating?
Celebrate? I'm celebrating I haven't been shot... yet.
Found half a bottle of vodka. That's my celebration. Piss off.
Go shoot a Loner. Take his dinner. Best party in the Zone.
Preliminary scans on the "Crystal Thorn" artifact show unprecedented energy oscillations. Lab 3 requests extended testing.
Approved. But implement Faraday shielding - recall the Yantar incident.
Compare readings to Noosphere models. Could validate Sakharov's resonance theory.
Require military escort for hazardous materials transfer. Duty squad unavailable until Thursday.
Pseudodog pack near Yanov exhibiting coordinated hunting tactics. Request drone surveillance authorization.
Denied. Military restricted airspace after last week's... mishap.
Document via ground cameras. Suggest deploying ultrasonic deterrents during observation.
Cross-reference with '09 Chimeras study. Possible emergent intelligence?
Kyiv cut our Q3 funding by 40%. All non-essential field research suspended effective immediately.
Prioritize emission prediction models. Everything else is academic luxury now.
Propose artifact sales to Sidorovich. His prices are criminal but better than termination.
Reminder: Hide this from the military liaison. They'll demand "security reallocation".
Freedom's radio jamming disrupted seismic monitors in the Red Forest. Data loss: 78 hours.
File formal complaint with both factions. Attach reconstruction cost estimates.
Switch to hardwired sensors. More installation risk but immune to idiot interference.
Send Kruglov to negotiate. He speaks "stalker". Bring vodka bribes.
New spatial distortion detected in Jupiter warehouse district. Gravitational readings defy current models.
Deploy mobile sensor array but maintain 200m perimeter. Recall what happened to Lebedev's team.
Correlate with recent emission patterns. Could be precursor event.
Request artifact hunters for probe deployment. Offer premium rubles - no volunteers last time.
Fungal spores in Lab 4 ventilation. Mutation rate suggests Zone-adapted strain.
Seal sector. Initiate decon protocol Gamma. And someone find where Petrenko left his samples again.
Fascinating! Preserve samples in cryo-chamber before sterilization.
Medical staff alerted. Expect quarantine complaints from junior researchers.
Kyiv University demands access to our mutant tissue archives. "Academic cooperation" request.
Deny. Their NDAs are worthless. Last leak nearly started a pandemic scare.
Offer redacted data sets only. Charge triple the standard rate.
Remind them we require field support personnel if they want favors. PhDs don't survive emissions.
Anomaly suppression field generator failed during Borets testing. Technician hospitalized.
Cease all suppression experiments until safety review. Form committee.
Review harmonics alignment. The 2017 failure occurred at identical resonance frequencies.
Medical report shows only minor burns. Resume testing with remote drones next week.
Stalker delivered albino Bloodsucker carcass. Payment authorized despite odor complaints.
Prioritize genetic sequencing before decomposition. Cancel all other Lab 2 projects.
Store in Hangar 7. Main freezer still smells from last Chimera autopsy.
Verify it's not just paint. Remember the "psy-dog" hoax?
Post-emission scans show anomaly migration in Garbage. Previous maps obsolete.
Update Stalker PDAs immediately. Morozov's team nearly walked into a new vortex.
Correlate displacement vectors with Noosphere activity logs. Prediction algorithm needs refinement.
Send warnings to Loner leaders. And charge Duty for the cartography updates.
Proposal: Study Monolith psy-effects on volunteers. Promising neural adaptation data.
Rejected. The '08 experiments violated seven international treaties. Burn this memo.
Could we use condemned prisoners? Kyiv offered "resources" last month...
Study historical data only. Even Clear Sky wouldn't touch this.
Prototype artifact scanner achieved 92% accuracy in field tests. Production proposal?
Submit to military contractors. They'll fund mass production for their own use.
Patent first! The schematics alone could restore our budget.
Require durability testing. Stalkers break everything within weeks.
Excavated pre-Consciousness lab notes from X-10. Contain references to "Noosphere stabilization".
Restore documents in nitrogen chamber. Handle only with gloves - paper is brittle.
Cross-reference with Strelok's PDA data. He might have unknowingly completed their work.
Restrict access to Level 5 researchers. This could attract... unwanted attention.
Acid fog approaching Yantar perimeter. Seal vents and activate air scrubbers.
Scrubbers at 47% efficiency. Maintenance was delayed by budget cuts.
Collect atmospheric samples! Unique chemical composition opportunity.
Move sensitive equipment to underground labs. And someone check the seals on Bunker 3.
Require volunteer stalkers for mutant behavior tracking. Hazard pay: 5,000R/day.
Too low. Last volunteer lost his legs. Double the offer.
Attach sensors to captured pseudodogs instead. More ethical and cost-effective.
Contract Mercenaries? They follow protocols better than Loners.
Anomaly Research Division monopolized the spectral analyzers again. Genetics work delayed.
Implement strict scheduling. Violators lose lab privileges.
Sabotage their cryo-pumps? (Joke... mostly)
Remind them we control mutant tissue access. Leverage is everything.
Confirmed: Emission patterns correlate with solar flares! Prediction accuracy now 73%.
Publish immediately. This justifies five years of budget requests.
Withhold key variables. Military would weaponize this knowledge.
Calibrate field sensors accordingly. And warn Clear Sky remnants - they'll appreciate it.
Bandits hijacked our lithium battery shipment. Alternatives for field equipment?
Repurpose artifact power cores. Dangerous but available.
Bribe Freedom to retrieve shipment. Their price: three medkits and anomaly maps.
Activate contingency: Soviet-era batteries in Storage 7. Half still hold charge.
Level 4 biohazard breach in Mutagenics Lab. Full lockdown initiated.
Seal ventilation shafts 7-12. Containment before extraction.
Was it Sample KR-77? I warned about unstable cell replication!
Prepare amnestics for affected personnel. Standard memory wipe protocol.
Decrypted 87% of the 2006-2008 O-Consciousness servers. Finalizing archive access.
Restrict to senior staff only. Junior researchers lack context for this magnitude.
Search for Project "Gradient" files. Their early work could explain current anomalies.
Burn all psychic resonance studies. Some knowledge should remain lost.
The Unclean approach the Holy City. Prepare the Northern Barrier. Glory to Monolith.
Mines blessed. They will find purity in fire.
Sniper teams ascend the Tower. Their eyes serve the Rock.
We hear the Whisper. Their path ends at the bridge.
A Sparkle shines in the Dead City. Bring it to the Altar.
Cleansing unbelievers en route. Their blood pleases the Whole.
Psi-guardians stir. The Artifact sings to them.
It will strengthen the Barrier. The Whisper commands it.
The Great Cleansing approaches. Stand in the Light. Rejoice.
We are chosen. Our minds will shine brighter.
Let the weak burn. Only the faithful remain.
The Rock shelters us. We feel its pulse.
Defilers in the Cathedral. Silence their blasphemous guns.
Duty filth cornered. Offering their souls to the Void.
Their screams are hymns. The Whisper approves.
No prisoners. Only sacrifices.
A stalker with the Mark approaches. He must not reach the Nucleus.
Seen near Limansk. His mind... resists the Whisper.
Send the Blessed Ones. Their psy-lances will shatter him.
Kill his companions. Let despair guide him to us.
Anomalies weaken at Sector 7. Consecrate the ground with blood.
Captured Bandits ready. Their fear feeds the Barrier.
Bury their bodies facing the West. The Void hungers.
The Rock trembles. Our offering is accepted.
Controllers report unbelievers near the Brain Scorcher. Redirect the horde.
Pseudogiants awakened. They serve the Purpose.
Bloodsuckers hunt in the fog. The Unclean will know terror.
No survivors. Let mutants feast on their doubt.
Guardian Boris fell to Mercenary heretics. Retrieve his skull.
It rests on their campfire. A desecration.
Burn their bodies. Scatter ashes to the anomalies.
His soul returns to the Whole. Glory his name.
Abandon Red Forest outpost. The Cleansing purifies it tomorrow.
Rig reactors to overload. A beacon for the Blowout.
Leave relics for the unbelievers. Their corruption deepens.
We withdraw. The Void claims what is owed.
New acolytes arrive at the Barrier. Prepare the Initiation.
Their minds are weak. The Scorcher will make them strong.
Those who resist become mutants. A noble service.
The Whisper welcomes all. Willing or unwilling.
Gauss rifles blessed at the Sarcophagus. Deploy to the Southern Eye.
Their light pierces heresy. A gift from the Rock.
Target the armored ones. Let faith shatter steel.
Waste no ammunition. Each shot serves the Whole.
Doubt echoes in Pavel's mind. Guide him to the Scorcher.
He questions the Barrier. Heresy must burn.
His pain will be ecstasy. The Whisper cleanses.
If he resists... feed him to the poltergeists.
Freedom defilers destroyed our shrine. Retribution is demanded.
Trace their camp. Poison their water with radionuclides.
Leave their leader alive. Let him carry the Zone's curse.
Their screams will echo to the Brain. The Whisper hears.
Patrols report silence in the Dead City. Too silent.
Mercenary assassins. They hide from the Light.
Flush them with fire. Burn the shadows.
Their technology fails here. The Rock protects.
The Vortex anomaly hungers. Feed it the captured unbeliever.
His terror sustains the Barrier. A worthy end.
Bind him with blessed wires. Let the Vortex taste his soul.
When it screams, the path to the Nucleus strengthens. Glory.
Their artillery shakes the earth. Stand firm in faith.
Concrete cracks. Faith does not. We endure.
Let them waste shells. The Void consumes their greed.
Their noise is silence to the Whisper. We hear only purpose.
Brother Gregor's form changes. The Zone embraces him.
His flesh becomes armor. His pain, strength.
Station him at the Tunnel. Let heretics see divine evolution.
His mind remains pure. The Whisper guides his claws.
The Great Door weakens. Soon, the Nucleus will awaken.
Let the Unclean come. Their bodies fertilize sacred ground.
The final Cleansing nears. All will be One.
Glory to Monolith. Forever.
Move through the Pripyat sewers. The Whisper hides us.
Drown the rats. Their squeals betray faith.
Emerging at Hospital. Strike their medics first.
No radio. Only the Rock guides.
Brothers fallen at Limansk return to the Whole. Rejoice.
Their sacrifice fuels the Barrier. Glory their names.
No graves. Their bodies serve the anomalies now.
We hear their whispers in the Void. They are with us.
